alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Canyon Ferry Area; Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Gallatin Valley; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Helena Valley; Meagher County Valleys; Missouri Headwaters; Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 11 at 2:29AM MDT until April 11 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of central and southwest Montana. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 9 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris and damage property. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
